channel.title: Evy Kassirer - Blog
channel.description: Tech, education, music, and other things I am passionate about.

item.title: Practicing the Tough Stuff --> Loving the Tough Stuff
item.description: I have been very involved in music for the majority of my life, but have never particularly enjoyed individual practice. Still, it is very important and has positively influenced my experiences.

item.title: So You're Gonna Be A Tech Major?
item.description: Are you about to begin a degree in Computer Science? Engineering? Math? Awesome. I hope to highlight some of the important parts of being a tech major, what to expect, and how to succeed.

item.title: Ability To Learn - Curiosity
item.description: There's one common theme in what I think is really effective for being satisfied and finding success, especially in technical fields like CS : the ability to learn â€“ specifically, being curious and asking questions.

item.title: First Hackathon - BroncoHack
item.description: While I'm in the Bay Area for co-op, I want to really take advantage of all the tech and coding opportunities around me - and this was a great start to my summer. And I want to share my first hackathon experience and recommendations to start off this blog!
